sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories"> <x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category_level display_value="Senior Level">f2320462db9d23008e9357935e961911</category_level> <category_name>Enterprise Service Desk Specialist</category_name> <education_level display_value="High school Diploma or General Equivalency Diploma (GED)">9972c462db9d23008e9357935e9619b1</education_level> <minimum_experience>Under broad direction, oversee operations in support of the Enterprise Service Desk and existing non-local Service Desks, review and correlate tailored reports, oversee review and correlation of audits, oversee Tier 2 or higher analysis in response to Service Desk escalation, oversee ticket management process, maintain overall required levels of performance of Information Technology Services. Manage all SysAdmin activities and overall operation of Remedy software. 10+ years of experience required with at least 10 years of experience using Remedy. Certified in accordance with DODD 8570.1 Information Assurance Technician II. Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) version 3 Foundation with additional ITILv3 certifications recommended.</minimum_experience> <number>LABCAT0001094</number> <parent_category/> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-24 16:40:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>fbc48426db9d23008e9357935e9619df</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 16:44:46</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories> </record_update>
